amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to establish a grant program for states to reduce the burdens associated with health care administrative work and reduces HHS administrative costs by 50% over 10 years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to establish a grant program for states to reduce the burdens associated with health care administrative work and reduces HHS administrative costs by 50% over 10 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Axne amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mrs. Axne.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Axne amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
